name: Gmail 2018 Update, Very Spacious Apple SF UI Font
description: An over padded layout for the NEW gmail redesign.
additional_info:
This is for NEW GMAIL as of MAY 2018, if you do not have new gmail enabled, this will not work.

1: Apple SF UI Display font:Apple SF UI Display Font

2: Go to the gear (top right) then Themes, then select 'Light'

3: Gear > Display Density > Default

4: Select a provided wallpaper, or anything with a semi-dark background for contrast, as the containers are semi-opaque white.

Custom Wallpapers:

Green Skies:Wallpaper (go to gear > themes > my photos)

Purple SkiesWallpaper (go to gear > themes > my photos)
